trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that can contain controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> que podem conter controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> class, specifying the containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> classe, especificando que o contém <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O que contém <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>, inclusive seus elementos não clientes, em pixels, relativos ao controle pai.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the Bounds property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>propriedade obtém somente o cliente elementos do controle, a propriedade limites obtém os elementos de cliente e não cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o tamanho e local.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be dragged and dropped into a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> podem ser arrastadas e soltas em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be dragged and dropped into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ser arrastadas e soltas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is enough space in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> to receive the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se não houver espaço suficiente no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> para receber o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os controles de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço, em pixels, que é especificado pelo padrão entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento padrão entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno, em pixels, do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento interno do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área de exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the DisplayRectangle property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>propriedade obtém o cliente e não cliente elementos, a propriedade DisplayRectangle obtém somente o cliente elementos do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o tamanho e local.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do mecanismo de layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> para o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBoundsChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor original do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnControlAdded também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O controle que foi adicionado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero representando a posição do controle adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnControlRemoved method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnControlRemoved também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O que foi removido do controle de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero que representa a posição do controle removido.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLayout method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLayout também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnOrientationChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnOrientationChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> relative to its containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção do layout do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> em relação ao seu contendo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o preenchimento dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> representar características de espaçamento interno do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.
